description: Kinzou`s first daughter, and is the second oldest of her siblings. She was able to have her husband adopted as a Ushiromiya, which allows her to keep the family name. She is usually kind to the four children, but is hostile towards Krauss and his wife, Natsuhi. She is against George and Shannon`s love, thinking to safeguard her son`s future.
name: Ushiromiya Eva
